theVampire:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theVampire:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theVampire:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theVampire:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theVampire:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theVampire:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theVampire:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theVampire:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theVampire:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theVampire:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theVampire:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theVampire:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theVampire:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

theVampire:Devour.NAME: Devour
theVampire:Devour.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, Enemy loses 2 Strength. Exhaust
theVampire:Devour.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, Enemy loses 2 Strength, Gain 2 Strength. NL Exhaust.

theVampire:Temptation.NAME: Temptation
theVampire:Temptation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times. thevampire:Feast !M! : gain !M! Strength and !M! Blood.

theVampire:Reserve.NAME: Reserve
theVampire:Reserve.DESCRIPTION: At the end of the encounter, ignore !M! thevampire:Thirst.

theVampire:Anticipation.NAME: Anticipation
theVampire:Anticipation.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw Blood, heal 1 HP.

theVampire:CrimsonShield.NAME: Crimson Shield
theVampire:CrimsonShield.DESCRIPTION: Converts the next damage you are dealt into thevampire:Thirst.
theVampire:CrimsonShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Converts the next damage you are dealt into thevampire:Thirst.

theVampire:CursedFumes.NAME: Cursed Fumes
theVampire:CursedFumes.DESCRIPTION: Apply Vulnerable equal to your thevampire:Thirst to all ennemies.

theVampire:GiveIn.NAME: Give In
theVampire:GiveIn.DESCRIPTION: thevampire:Feast 50% of your thevampire:Thirst. Deal that much damage.
theVampire:GiveIn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thevampire:Feast 75% of your thevampire:Thirst. Deal that much damage.

theVampire:OpenWound.NAME: Open Wound
theVampire:OpenWound.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. When you attack the creature this turn, gain 1 thevampire:Thirst.

theVampire:BloodTax.NAME: Blood Tax
theVampire:BloodTax.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to each enemy, then add 1 thevampire:Blood to your draw pile for each enemy hit.

theVampire:Repent.NAME: Repent
theVampire:Repent.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all thevampire:Blood in your draw pile. Heal 1 HP for each thevampire:Blood exhausted. NL Exhaust.
theVampire:Repent.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all thevampire:Blood in your draw pile. Heal 1 HP for each thevampire:Blood exhausted.

theVampire:RedMist.NAME: Red Mist
theVampire:RedMist.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! thevampire:Blood in your draw pile. Gain 1 Intangible for each thevampire:Blood exhausted. NL Exhaust.

theVampire:VampireForm.NAME: ??? Form
theVampire:VampireForm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play thevampire:Blood, steal !M! HP to each enemy. NL Ethereal.
theVampire:VampireForm.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you exhaust thevampire:Blood, steal !M! HP to each enemy. NL Ethereal.

theVampire:BasicAttack.NAME: Drink
theVampire:BasicAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 thevampire:Blood to your draw pile.

theVampire:Satiated.NAME: Satiated
theVampire:Satiated.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each thevampire:Blood in your hand.

theVampire:FinalBlow.NAME: Final Blow
theVampire:FinalBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage for each stack of Vulnerable on the target. NL Remove all its vulnerable.

theVampire:DelightInTheHunt.NAME: Delight In The Hunt
theVampire:DelightInTheHunt.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal damage to an enemy with Vulnerable, add 1 thevampire:Blood to your draw pile.
theVampire:DelightInTheHunt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you deal damage to an enemy with Vulnerable, add 1 thevampire:Blood to your draw pile.

theVampire:KillerIntents.NAME: Killer Intents
theVampire:KillerIntents.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the target is vulnerable, repeat.

theVampire:BloodFrenzy.NAME: Blood Frenzy
theVampire:BloodFrenzy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! times !D! damage. NL Costs 1 less for each thevampire:Blood in your draw pile.

theVampire:RejuvenatingDrink.NAME: Rejuvenating Drink
theVampire:RejuvenatingDrink.DESCRIPTION: thevampire:Consume !M! thevampire:Blood : gain !M! energy. NL Exhaust.
theVampire:RejuvenatingDrink.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thevampire:Consume !M! thevampire:Blood : gain !M! energy and lose !theVampire:SecondMagic! thevampire:Thirst. NL Exhaust.

theVampire:QuenchTheThirst.NAME: Quench The Thirst
theVampire:QuenchTheThirst.DESCRIPTION: thevampire:Feast !M! : Heal !theVampire:SecondMagic! HP. NL Deal !D! damage.

theVampire:ReadyToHunt.NAME: Ready To Hunt
theVampire:ReadyToHunt.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Thirst. Draw !theVampire:SecondMagic! additional card next turn.
theVampire:ReadyToHunt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Thirst. Draw !theVampire:SecondMagic! additional cards next turn.

theVampire:Impersonate.NAME: Impersonate
theVampire:Impersonate.DESCRIPTION: thevampire:Feast !M! : Add a random form to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

theVampire:Purify.NAME: Purify
theVampire:Purify.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Lose all your Vulnerable, Weak and Frail. NL Exhaust.

theVampire:Appetizer.NAME: Appetizer
theVampire:Appetizer.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. Gain !M! thevampire:Thirst. NL Exhaust.

theVampire:Retreat.NAME: Retreat
theVampire:Retreat.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block, apply !M! Weak to each Vulnerable enemy.

theVampire:AimForTheVeins.NAME: Aim For The Veins
theVampire:AimForTheVeins.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is Vulnerable, add 1 thevampire:Blood to your draw pile.

theVampire:Exsanguinate.NAME: Exsanguinate
theVampire:Exsanguinate.DESCRIPTION: deals !D! damages !M! times, add one blood to you deck per hit

theVampire:FlashyStrike.NAME: Flashy Strike
theVampire:FlashyStrike.DESCRIPTION: deals !D! damages, apply 1 Vulnerable to everyone

theVampire:CrossingWater.NAME: Crossing Water
theVampire:CrossingWater.DESCRIPTION: gain !B! block, you cannot attack for the rest of the turn

theVampire:AwaitInvitation.NAME: Await Invitation
theVampire:AwaitInvitation.DESCRIPTION: gain !B! block, gain !M! Strength at the end of turn

theVampire:Gore.NAME: Gore
theVampire:Gore.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damages, if the enemy is Vulnerable, Apply !M! Vulnerable

theVampire:MenacingPosture.NAME: Menacing Posture
theVampire:MenacingPosture.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a non-Attack card, gain 1 Vigor

theVampire:BonAppetit.NAME: Bon Appetit !
theVampire:BonAppetit.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Apply 2 Vulnerable and 2 Weak to every enemy, gain 3 Strength this turn. Exhaust

theVampire:RedHanded.NAME: Red-Handed
theVampire:RedHanded.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have thevampire:Blood in your hand, Deals !D! damages

theVampire:OneStepAhead.NAME: One Step Ahead
theVampire:OneStepAhead.DESCRIPTION: if the enemy intend to attack, gain !B! block, otherwise, gain twice this amount next turn
theVampire:OneStepAhead.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: if the enemy intend to attack, gain !B! block, otherwise, gain thrice this amount next turn
